Powerkilometer Multi-Field Carousel TestPowerKilometerMultiField My Value Pkm /h av. Powerkilometer per hour Average Gradient Grad. % Total Powerkilometer Pkm/h Powerkilometer per hour Av. Powerkilometer per hour Duration of Value displaying How many seconds a value be displayed prior changing to the next one? Please provide a value of at least 1 Display actual Pkm/h? Collect actual Pkm/h? Test //Only add if in testmode else empty
Display average Pkm/h? Collect average Pkm/h?
Display total Pkm? Collect total Pkm?
Display actual gradient? Collect actual gradient?
Please Select Value in Settings
All each iteration shall the values be updated? Defines the number of iteration to wait for the values to be updated. The higher the number, the flatter the resulting curves. Depending on the recording method (smart vs. every second), the iteration time varies.
